comment: After we checked out we expected to go down to the valet area and have our car ready. We proceded down there and had to wait for over 15 minutes while other cars were being brought down. There was no specific order on when they brought the cars, when it would be expected that first person to ask for there car would get theres first. Other customers were irate and another had a huge door ding in there car. The process was very unorganized and for paying that amount of money I would expect better service.

title: Love this hotel
comment: Across the street is smathers beach, with rentals from beach chairs to water sports. The hotel has a nice pool and bar. In the morning you can sit outside on the patio overlooking the pool and enjoy the Island vibe while you eat breakfast. The rooms are nice and clean. Staff is friendly. They have a shuttle that runs back and forth from the hotel to downtown all day. You can also rent bikes at the hotel. I would stay here again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Dated hotel needs infusion of capital to clean it up
title: Belvoir needs work
comment: This could be a nice hotel if they put some money into it.hallways are dirty and

title: July 2012 stay
comment: I stay at this hotel annually on business. The hotel is immaculate. The staff is extremely friendly. I was disappointed this time with the restaurant. On Sunday, I had to be in a meeting at 7:30 am. The 7:00 breakfast buffet had not opened by 7:10, so breakfast was missed.

title: Shuttle service
comment: I had to phone the front desk 3 times and waited more than 2 hours before the shuttle bus picked me up at the airport. Meantime the hotel is only 10 min from the airport. I had a similar experience the year before. Very poor service!

everyoneShouldKnow: Great comfort and hospitality value at a very reasonable rate.
title: Wonderful Experience
comment: Our family loved the suite and our stay at the SSG Atlanta. Service from staff was excellent. We asked for extra pillows and blankets for our children and they came immediately. The staff at the front desk greeted us with a smile and courteously responded during check-in, check-out and when we asked for restaurant/attraction suggestions.

title: Great Hotel
comment: We planned a girls weekend in Denver and were looking for a place downtown and a place we felt safe. We had a great time in the hotel bar and the rooms were safe and they were clean. We had a great time staying here. The only thing we didn't like is the pool was small. It was very crowded.

everyoneShouldKnow: somewhat dated with healthclub equipment fine but facilities in need of repair or refinement.
title: An airport "experience"
comment: Unlike center city hotels this hotel has many kids running in the hallways and confined to the hotel proper. The Belvoir is a fine chain but the room I had was next to the elevator and also had a faulty toilet that would eventually turn off. One night was fine but any longer would have been tough to cope with.

title: Awful stay, awful service
comment: This place is an unorganized mess. We waited 6 hours to check in, they finally had our rooms ready ay 9pm. We were asked to wait in the courtesy lounge. We expected some appetizers and a free drink, instead we got a bottle of water and a bag of Cheetos in a warm room. All we got from the staff was "I'm sorry", no compensation, no explanation. They obviously do not want people to come back. This group embarrassed the Belvoir chain.

everyoneShouldKnow: Service is excellent by all staff personnel
title: Excellent hotel
comment: I give this hotel an overall excellent rating.

title: learning forward stay
comment: comfortable, classy, clean

everyoneShouldKnow: They truly care about the experiance of their guests!
title: Supreme Service
comment: I chose this hotel to propose to my girlfriend. The hotel staff was so accomidating. They helped me with every step of my proposal. Brandon (the night auditor) helped me early in the morning (at the end of his shift) toe notes on 3 dozen roses. Thurston (the bellman) took my inital call and was excited to help, and was there to help tie on notes as well. Every night when we would return to the hotel, the staff would approach us with excitement.

everyoneShouldKnow: Not only is the hotel comfortable but it is centrally located in a wonderful area for sightseeing, dining, and shopping within walking distance.
title: Wonderful wedding venue
comment: The Belvoir Portsmouth Harborside is an excellent location for a wedding. The staff is friendly and efficient. The quality of food and service is excellent.

title: Wonderful Hotel but still does not meet Belvoir known standards
comment: We had not stayed at this particular hotel until after renovations were finished. The Hotel still lacks in the accomodations provided. The bathroom, though looks like it has been remodeled, still lacks in some details - paint chipping, bath faucet/shower controls, wallpaper peeling in some areas. The bed looked inviting, but was not. Quality mattresses are a must for a Belvoir class hotel. These were not. My husband and I both had the same opinion re: the mattress/bed, and we are two different types of sleepers.

title: 50th Birthday
comment: I was celebrating my 50th birthday. The hotel made it very special with a room upgrade, complimentary breakfast and overall terrific staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: The view and property is unmatched!
title: Even though I live locally...
comment: Because I have lived down the street from the hotel my entire life, as a parent- a evening without your child is a well deserved night off. Being that it was also my wedding anniversary made it especially a needed retreat. I have stayed at the property several times over the last 30 years and been a guest of renters as well. The beach and pool are amazing and when combined with the bar and lunch areas make for a fun filled day. With the age of the hotel, one might think that it would desperately need renovations. But I have always found that it has undergone many face-lifts to keep up with the times and quality you would expect and desire in your stay on Sand Key Beach. I would and have always referred this hotel to all my friends and family and would without hesitation to a stranger. The location is also a tremendous plus, It's location has the feeling of seclusion while also being moments from fast paced stretch of Clearwater Beach. I have always enjoyed my extended stays and short visits and look forward to my next! You will not find better accomodations or location anywhere on the Gulf side of Florida! Do yourself and family a favor and book your next visit to the area- at the Belvoir Sand Key.

title: Nice location but service needs improvement
comment: staff was not very servicing for my needs

everyoneShouldKnow: Nice hotel for families, and it's conveniently located close to family venues.
title: This hotel has small bathrooms
comment: We were generally pleased with the hotel overall. The staff was nice, room was clean, the hotel had good amenities, and we were happy with the location. We used the jacuzzi tub one evening, and the water termp was perfect, and the water was sparkling clean. We had breakfast at Humphries and thought the food was just okay. The bathroom was one area that I thought was lacking. Our room, #816, had a tiny bathroom. Barely enough space in there to turn around. We've stayed at this hotel before, and I can't remember the bath in the room we had being as small as this one. Which leads me to another complaint. We are BPG gold members, and the staff said they upgraded us to a deluxe room, but with the small bathroom, it really didn't seem like an upgrade. That was dissappointing, especially since were were celebrating our wedding anniversary.

title: wonderful weekend
comment: Our stay was wonderful. The hotel was nice, and the amenities were exceptional.

title: Great Views
comment: Nice hotel with a great view of NYC.

title: Belvoir Review
comment: Staff did not offer to help with baggage and we were told we had to wait for a cart. After waiting (both at check-in and check-out) I had to request them to look in the lobby closet for a cart for out baggage, only to find several carts in there all alone. Also, the room temp was okay but we were unable to get it cool enough.

title: The staff is not helpful.
comment: Over priced!!! when there is an issue staff / general manager not willing to return your call to discuss the issue.

title: One night no sleep
comment: We were here for one night and barely got any sleep. The beds were the most uncomfortable beds I have ever slept on. Felt like I was sleeping on a concrete floor.

title: Great hotel, wonderful staff
comment: We had a wonderful time staying at this facility - location is in the heart of Portsmouth - staff were very cordial and made our stay enjoyable - We will be back

title: felt like i was sleeping in the fourth lane of the highway
comment: room had SOO much highway noise and then the fire alarm went off, but it was so dim it sounded like an alarm clock.. Thankfully, an announcement came on over the intercom waking us to tell us that all was okay. The decor was 1980's and needs an overhaul.

title: Great rooms, bad staff
comment: My wife and I came here for our honeymoon to Walt Disney World. Upon arriving we were incredibly excited and shocked to see how nice this resort was. It is beautiful and very well maintained. We checked-in in about 5 minutes and were led to the concierge who was amazing. She gave us basic welcome information, some coupons for local restaurants and a sheet for all the times for the shuttle to Disney World. The next morning we arrived to wait for the shuttle with about 20 other people. However, the shuttle was over 20 minutes late picking us up. They said it was a fluke so we ignored it and had a great day at Magic Kingdom. That night, we went to the bus stop to be picked up by the bus to get back to the hotel. This time, the bus was over 30 minutes late. We got back to the hotel and I decided to call and ask if there were any other ways of getting to Disney besides the bus since we were only in Orlando for Disney. When I called, the lady very rudely told me that no one ever complains about the bus, and that the only other way to get to Disney would be a Taxi and that would be very expensive. She then said the bus was always on time. The bus was late every evening picking us up, at least by 15 minutes. One time, it even came to the wrong bus stop and almost left 20 people stranded at Disney World. I know this sounds like a review for the bus service, but the Belvoir hires them and refuses to help fix it. We left a message with the Manager so hopefully it will be fixed in the future. But after this experience, we won't be staying here again.

title: Needs improvment
comment: The carpet inour room was dirty with stains it didn't want me to take off my shoes. 3 light bulbs were burnt out the phone didn't work. The gym facility was out of sanitary wipes and WATER . I told this to the front desk was in the gym for 45 min. and still no one came. I left a shoe in the room and no one turned it in.

title: Nice Common Areas; Average Room
comment: Note that this visit was for business, associated with a co-located conference, so access to local attractions was not an aspect of this stay. That said, the location -- right by the Disney Boardwalk -- provides convenient water taxi access to Epcot. Minor inconvenience related to check-in: was issued door-lock cards that would not open assigned room. Upon returning to reception desk discovered that incorrect dates had been written to card (had put first day's date as the checkout date) and new cards were issued. Room was relatively large and had a separate desk workspace. Hotel lobby, function space, and exterior were very well maintained; room furnishings less so. Housekeeping was generally OK; minor incidents: one day hadn't made up room by 4PM so needed to call, another day toiletries hadn't been restocked. Fitness center was nice and access was included in resort fee. Bottom line: this is a fine place to stay if you are attending a convention or other business event here and not desiring a more upscale experience.

everyoneShouldKnow: Nice hotel near shopping and restaurants.
title: Nice hotel
comment: Overnight stay was comfortable. Pricey. Food tray was in the hall when arrived, and still there when I returned to room much later that night.

title: Hotel needs work
comment: A C Hardly worked...took ALL day to cool.

title: Excellent Customer Service
comment: Upon arrival at the hotel my boyfriend and I were warmly received by the concierge staff. When the staff member assisting us inquired regarding the reason for our visit to Burlington I mentioned that we were in the area looking for housing for me, as I had recently accepted a professor position at a local university for the fall semester. The staff member congratulated me, and I thought nothing more of the conversation until later that evening when my boyfriend and I returned to our room to find a bottle of wine and a cheese plate accompanied by a note reading, "Congratulations Professor, and Welcome to the Neighborhood." I was truly touched by this unexpected gesture and it completely made my day. Excellent customer service indeed!

everyoneShouldKnow: The service was excellent, and if you want a luxurious night sleep on clean, high quality linen this is your place.
title: Everything at the hotel was beautiful
comment: Registration went very smoothly, the staff was excellent the room was clean, the linen was clean and crisp which made me feel that I could lay on the comforter, and that's a big deal. I would recommend this hotel and plan to stay again on my next trip.

everyoneShouldKnow: Staff and management are not friendly and make serious booking mistakes.
title: frusterating visit
comment: We had multiple issues with our room and we were suppose to be in a corner club level suite and we got a room with a ac unit that didn't work right, nats in the bathroom and dirty linens.I couldn't wait to get home.

everyoneShouldKnow: Loooong hot hike to beach with no boardwalk to help anything on wheels
title: LONG WALK TO ACTUAL BEACH
comment: Although the staff and overall experience within this hotel was wonderful, we were not pleased to have to drag our cooler and beach gear the equivalent of a long city block with NO wooden walkway provided the distance to the actual beach. Once on the beach, it is inconvenient to be so far from the hotel... Food, drinks and bathrooms are a hot hike away. Certainly not pleasant for adults but very annoying if you have little ones I would imagine. No beach chairs or umbrellas provided by the hotel. The "on beach" location was why we booked it. We won't return to this location.

title: Great Service
comment: Sam the front office manager and the host at the club lounge (can't remember his name) went above and beyond in making my family's stay at this hotel very enjoyable. When we needed, they helped to arrange new rooms for us and were extremely gracious with lounge access. Thank you and will definitely keep this hotel in mind for the next time we are in LA.

title: Satisfied Customer
comment: I really enjoyed my stay there. The bed was the best and I just loved the pillows. Housekeeping was not very good with cleaning the tub, but overall the stay was very good.

everyoneShouldKnow: The property is very secure if you are traveling abroad
title: great for park and fly
comment: We where going on vacation and decided to stay here because of the secure property, room was alright, wish it was a little more spacious,they should have a continental breakfast for early birds

everyoneShouldKnow: the tower rooms are very nice when upgraded for BPG gold, but the club breakfast is marginally acceptable.
title: Dr. FEIS
comment: Exceptionally refurbished and styled facility, tower is well appointed for every type of traveler. Club breakfast could be better - maybe it is on weekdays, but more than sufficient as a free upgrade - with a wonderful 24th floor view. Excellent work out room, two pools seem enough for crowded weekend Irish FEIS. Free upgraded tower room was excellent in size and quality.

title: Beautiful & Comfortable
comment: I enjoyed my weekend away from home.

title: Belvoir Marina- San Diego
comment: Great views of San Diego Bay, Marina and City, especially at night. Close to Airport but not a big issue. Good shuttle facilities to the Airport, Town and to key places nearby. Happy to recommend to others.

title: Staff is freindly
comment: My interaction with all staff, resulted in prompt and positive responses

title: Wonderful hotel, would recommend!
comment: Only complaint I can offer for this hotel was the pool size, the pictures make it look much larger than it actually is. The pool seemed to be over filled with guests, Granted, we did stay at a very busy time. Rusty's Bistro was AMAZING! We didn't opt for any of the buffets ( which looked very tempting) yet stuck with menu items, and were more than pleased!! Martin was an amazing server and took very good care of us. All hotel staff was very helpful although the bar near the pool seemed as if their staff was on it's own time and even though they were not busy would stand around before even acknowledging you were there. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.We will definitely be returning.

title: Nice hotel, convenient location, staff...???
comment: There was a family reunion taking place the night we checked in and it took about 15 minutes to get a room. Upon getting to our room, we had a problem with our TV and we reported it around midnight. No-one came till 6 am the next morning to look at it. We needed extra towels and called the request in to hotel services. Two hours later, we walked down to the lobby to get our own towels. My husband needed some bottled water during the night and several of the vending machines (on different floors) were out of bottled water. The next morning, we went to the concierge to pick up some items and waited over 10 minutes before someone could get to us and then they did not help us. In frustration, we left our items on the counter and walked away. Customer service was NOT a priority on this weekend.

everyoneShouldKnow: Everyone was very professional, efficient and courteous.
title: Valet Parking
comment: This was a great stay everything and everyone were top notch. I really appreciated the Valet parking guys. They were quick to take and to retrieve our car for us without any hassle, very polite. Even when we first arrived and things were crazy for them. They were cool and efficient. They got our luggage to our room and picked up on our departure. Excellent!!! Check in and check out very efficient.

title: Great Place Great Location
comment: Great location will stay again. Very clean.

title: Good room view!
comment: My room was ok, there were knats in it, the phone on the desk did not work, the handle on the sink kept coming off. They had the nerve to want $50.00 a night for a mini fridge. The bed was a little hard. Staff was nice for the most part, rooms were clean.

title: I would not recommend.
comment: I chose this hotel because it was supposed to have been recently renovated. I did not see any indication of recent renovation anywhere in the hotel. The shower was in poor shape; The tiles around the faucet and shower head were falling off the wall. Our room was very damp and cold. Even the tissues felt damp when I used one! There were stains on the carpet in our room and a strong odor of paint all through the corridor.

everyoneShouldKnow: Perfect location in the middle of everything.
title: I will go back
comment: The best staff. Great customer service. I went down to ask for a electronics shop because I forgot my cell phone charger the guy asked what phone I had. I showed it to him, he came back to my room in 15 min with a charger that fit my phone. Let me borrow it until I checked out. He went out of his way.

title: BEAUTIFUL
comment: I HAD A WONDERFUL TIME THE HOTEL STAFF WAS GREAT I DIDNT HAVE ANY PROBLEMS OR COMPLAINTS AND I REALLY ENJOYED MY STAY.

title: good service
comment: a very nice hotel and great service

title: Wedding reception
comment: Our stay there was the best. We stayed there the night of my daughters wedding reception. Laura Gustafson was our wedding planner/director, she was informative, helpful and had everything under control from the moment we signed the contract till he end of the reception, she was there all evening directing guests and staff and kept on top of it. Our roon was free for the night and we got upgraded to club level on the 22nd floor, our room had the mist beautiful view of downtown and was unbelievable large. We had access to free appetizers, drinks and snacks and free b-fast I the morning. I can go on forever. Our large wedding was worth every penny. I will definitely go back.

title: Peewee
comment: Everything was great at the hotel

everyoneShouldKnow: location is great if you want to be around the downtown area
title: staff service inconsistent
comment: We arrived midnight and were assigned to a room at the Lanai, which reminded me more of a Days Inn motel. The room was not even what I had reserved. I asked for a room change the next morning; the first 4 calls, the staff were not helpful and instead directed my call to a voicemail. Fortunately, my 5th call found someone who facilitated the room change on the spot and we moved ourselves to the new room by 11am (no bellhops available). The room was avaialble when we came in and was what I had reserved. I don't understand why we were given the initial room in the first place! Otherwise the facilities were clean and beautiful.

title: This Hotel has Great internal Problems
comment: This is the WORST service I have ever received in my life, they charged my debit card 2 times in a row, I call them to clarify this issue and the girl in the phone just hung up 2 times and in my 3 phone call she did not answered... They call me back 2 days later and then they said everything was solved because they returned my money, but today, after a week of checking out, they charged me AGAIN!!!!! ...It is a shame the horrible service they have, next time stay somewhere else.

title: Very Accommodating
comment: The front desk gave us a room with a view of the falls when we asked. Thank you for letting me plug in and charge my car overnight. My wife and I enjoyed our stay and we'll be back again. I have only one request. I may be in the minority here but the pillows were too soft. My head just sunk to the bottom.

title: internet access
comment: Really wish there was no fee for in room internet. I've stayed in many hotels and most provide access free of charge (and the hotel fee is less than a Belvoir). It's time to review this policy. I was at Hershey Park and they even had free wi-fi.

everyoneShouldKnow: There is something to meet all of your needs.
title: The hotel is beautiful as well as comfortable
comment: This is the second time I have stayed in this hotel - the 1st time for a work conference & the 2nd time for a high school reunion. The meeting rooms are very spacious and staff are very accommodating. The sleeping rooms are beautifully furnished, very clean, and comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: THE HARBOR LOCATION PLUS THE POOL WAS SPECTACULAR
title: THE HOTEL IS A Grandbourne JEWEL
comment: THE LOCATION COMBINED WITH THE STAFF OF KNOWLEDGABLE AND HELPFUL ASSOCIATES MAKES THIS A WONDERFUL MEMORY FOR BOTH MYSELF AND FAMILY MEMBERS.

everyoneShouldKnow: A good central location, easy to get to and walking distance to many services.
title: The update of the hotel is well done.
comment: I have stayed at this facility over the last 6-8 years. Over time it really needed a facelift. The renovation is well done, the new lobby is great, welcoming and has little conversation areas, lots of computers and the Starbucks mini cafe is perfect.

everyoneShouldKnow: They care about their guests' experiences and want them to be happy.
title: #2's a Charm
comment: In May 2012 my boyfriend and I did not have the best experience at the hotel between long waits at the restaurant, broken elevator, not getting the room we asked for, a/c broken, etc. We were not happy at all. I filled out the hotel's survey after our stay and they offered us a 2nd chance and complimentary stay on them. At first we were hesitant to return, but upon our arrival they placed us in a junior suite and it was great! Super comfy bed, clean, great view, and we loved our room's layout. They really redeemed themselves and we are now happy customers! They didn't have to do this, but the hotel staff really cared to make sure we were satisfied.

everyoneShouldKnow: For families who desire convenience of being on the Disney compound.
title: no place for quiet
comment: Skip this property unless you desire to be in constant bombardment of canned/recorded music. There is not a place on the property that is not covered with recorded music or performing musicians. Expect to be inundated with Disney at every corner.

everyoneShouldKnow: Right in the city but have to pay for parking. Accessible to lots of restaurants, attractions, etc...
title: Our overnight stay
comment: Our overnight stay was very good. Check in was quick and efficient. Our room was clean. The parking garage is the only thing which needs improvement. The garage is absolutely filthy, garbage was everywhere on the ground and we could smell urine. Felt that it does not match with the rest of the Belvoir name. This parking also was not included with my stay so we paid extra for this--disappointing.

title: Great location
comment: Although I select this hotel for its proximity to LAX, it is a great choice in every way. The restaurant, bar, and fitness center are great amenities, and the Starbucks in the lobby is a great way to start the morning. I have stayed at this hotel several times and will return for future trips to LA.

title: Great place
comment: We stayed here only two nights for my sons wedding and had a wonderful time. Our room was beautiful....the bed was amazing and we had a great view of the pool. The staff was great....helpful, welcoming, and very friendly. We are waiting on the points accumilated for passing up the maid service and our complimentary points as a gift as a gold member. Overall great place to stay!

title: Pleasantly Surprised!
comment: Not sure if the room we had was due to being an BPG Gold Club member.... The room was HUGE! The rollaway fit w/o moving furniture AND still had plenty of room. Rollaway was in the room already for our late arrival. (I called only 15 min. before we arrived.) Clean room, ..TV worked, ...A/C worked well. Free bottled water! Plenty of free parking. We missed the continental breakfast in the Club Lounge, but we got the same for free in the restaurant (thank you)! Workers were VERY cordial.

title: Great stay!
comment: I only was here 1 night as I do live in NYC but my apartment was unavailable. I got a last minute pre-paid rate that was great. I usually stay at BPG luxury collection hotels but I'll have to say I was pleasantly surprised! The room was clean and the bed was VERY comfortable. I didn't have much interaction with the staff but what I did was courtesy and welcoming. I definitely will stay here again when my apartment is unavailable!

title: I'll Try Another Boston Hotel
comment: I love Grandbourne properties and try to pick them whenever I travel. I picked the Boston Belvoir because of it was close to where I was meeting the next day. The Boston Belvoir left something to be desired. A lot of the issues are minor, but because they all happened on the same trip, I was annoyed.

title: Great Location
comment: Was thrilled to have access to so many subways nearby, We had to go to Brooklyn for a wedding and it was easy.

title: Perfect
comment: I attended a conference while also extending my stay for a vacation to Walt Disney World with my family. We could not have had a better experience. We were able to view the fireworks at Epcot from our balcony and the staff attended to every need. This hotel offers more than we were able to take advantage of.

title: comfortable
comment: i have stayed there several times....always very satisfied...will stay again when in NYC

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a block away from Bricktown and the Amtrack Station.
title: Great staff
comment: Staff went out of the way to assist us in returning a rental car. Also enjoyed the managers reception and breakfast on the 15th floor!

title: Great Hotel
comment: The staff at the hotel were very pleasant and helpfull. The room size for the city was also very good. Enjoyed our stay and would recommend this hotel for leisure or work.

everyoneShouldKnow: Convenient to stay at if you're visiting someone at a nearby apartment complex.
title: Fantastic Experience
comment: The room was very nice, clean and quiet. The beds were very comfortable. The staff was friendly and most helpful. The decor and atmosphere was very relaxing. And the breakfast was delicious. Absolutely no complaints and I would definitely stay there again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Rude staff and some of them don't know what they are doing
title: extremely disapppinted
comment: When I tried to check in at the BPG counter @ 4:05 pm the front desk clerk tells me my room isn't ready it is being inspected ( which I find hard to believe with everything that went wrong with our room).. so she gives my husband 2 keys for him to park in the garage with while I'm waiting to check in. Well 5 minutes later my husband comes back because the keys aren't working this process takes her forever to fix. Finally when our room was ready we get there and the furnutre is in really bad condition. Especially with it being a junior suite the table looked as if of was gotten from the dumpster and oh yeah there was an old blood stain on the coverlet on the bed. We also requested a rollaway bed and this room had a dbl pull out sofa as well and there were no bedding items for this in our room and when the lady came to drop of the bedding she was rude and said did you even check the closet ... Of course I checked the closet ... Don't recommend this to anyone save your money and points. You are better off paying to stay elsewhere.

title: Concierge not worth upgrade
comment: I upgraded to concierge rooom because I was told there would be snacks all day (per sign on concierge door), breakfast, and cocktail hour food. I paid for the day I came in $30 and the coffee maker was out of milk and there was no cream or sugar out for coffee. The next day we had breakfast, snacks, and the evening cocktail hour food. All good. We had breakfast on Sunday and went up all day trying to get a coffee, water, snack and there were none to be had. We started lookin at 10:30 pm and at 3:00 pm I went to the front desk to inquire. They told me that snacks were placed out after breakfast and then no one came back on until the cocktail hour. I told them that I couldn't even get a cup of coffee and it said snacks were provided all day. They told me it had been very busy and food would arrive at the cocktail hour. Now the same snacks that had been there the day before were being sold to a dance competition. I suspect they were using the product from the concierge for that. I was pretty much dismissed. I do know that the employee that was working the room the most had to cover another employees schedule because they had called in. I spent in total $90 and only had one day where the food and drinks were availible to me. I came in on Friday around 10 pm and and left on Monday. It was disappointing.

title: Good choice
comment: This is a good hotel and I would stay again. There are a few things that need improvement. One of the elevators was out of order all four days we were there. In a 10 story hotel that is a big problem. We spent way too much time waiting for a lift.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellent staff, Everyone was very accomodating, Always asking if there any thing they could for us.
title: room upgrade
comment: After making a reservation with the frisco hotel, I received an e-mail with an upgrade that was available for my stay. The cost was very nominal, So I didn't think it would amount to much,But I decided to try it anyway. When we checked in, I was surprised when the upgrade included a room on a prefered floor, Late night snacks and breakfast in a private lounge. We really enjoyed the extras. GOOD JOB! LOVED IT!

title: Convenient to airport.
comment: We only needed a 1-night stay prior to catching a flight out the next morning. The Belvoir Mission Valley was an easy 10-minute drive to the airport, even in the morning commute traffic. The only negative to our stay was the parking charge. SInce the hotel was located in the Hotel Circle area, as opposed to a downtown location, there was ample parking available so the extra charge for parking was unexpected.

title: Great hotel, but Guest Services' staff needs to improve
comment: The hotel facilities were impeccable. The room was very comfortable and clean. My only concern was the guest services staff. The waiting time for check-in was not appropriate. I had to call several times in order to someone to pick up the phone during my stay. It seems that they were not ready to deal with certain volume of guest as the hotel was completely booked.

title: Beautiful Room
comment: Really nice hotel. The hotel is a couple of miles away from other restaurants and shopping so I was really glad I rented a car. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the hotel is convenient to the beach. The restaurant and bar were fairly pricey and there was an hour wait for dinner one evening but the food was good. I would stay again!

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel does not keep up on cleanliness.
title: Needs improvement
comment: This would be a nice hotel if it were updated. The room was ok other than the toe nail clippings on the carpet! They obviously did not vacuum when they cleaned the room. The pool was a dirty green color for our entire stay there and continued to get worse each day. There was even a staff member that mentioned they would not get in the pool because it looks disgusting! They said they have told the manager on numerous occasions that someone needs to clean it and they still had not taken care of the problem.

title: Hotel Rooms Need to Be Fully Renovated
comment: Typical Belvoir room. Great location...short walk to mall and easy access to highways.

everyoneShouldKnow: FRONT OF HOTEL NOT ON STEMMONS
title: THIS HOTEL NEEDS TO CLEAN ROOMS
comment: STAYED A COUPLE OF DAYS AND NO ONE CLEANED OUR ROOM. CALL THE FRONT DEST FOR TOWLES AND TOILET PAPER, NEVER CAME. I HEARD THE HOUSE KEEPING CREW OUTSIDE IN THE HALL. I HAD TO GO ASK THEM. DON'T KNOW IF THE CREW WAS JUST HAVING A BAD DAY.........

everyoneShouldKnow: It is wonderful minus courtesy airport transportation.
title: Wonderful Experience Except...
comment: Everything about the hotel was fabulous - amenities, location, staff and comfort. My only complaint - which is significant - is the lack of complementary transportation to and from the airport. For a hotel that hosts people from such far distances, the convenience of a hotel shuttle is needed. Given the price of the rooms, having to spend so much extra for transportation seemed insulting. I would recommend this hotel with a transportation disclaimer.

title: Great Stay!
comment: Hotel is very nice. Rooms were very clean and comfortable. Nice location. Only complaint would be, check in took a while becacuse of some computer problem houskeeping forgot to leave us soap. Room service was quick and food was delicious.

title: GREAT HOTEL
comment: My experience at the Sherton Hotel was great. I love the hotel and will be staying there everytime I come to New York to visit my daughter, which will be very often. GREAT HOTEL

title: Convenient Location
comment: I would expect more from Belvoir based on previous stays at different locations. The room itself was VERY small and had a strange odor. The room was booked as part of a travel package so it is what it is. The location is incredibly convenient to all of Denver.

everyoneShouldKnow: Quiet, comfortable oasis from airport chaos
title: Excellent airport hotel
comment: Location to airport is ideal, but the BEST feature is the ultimate soundproofing and room-darkening drapes.

title: not good
comment: this hotel was beyond crowded. the rooms as seen online were not comparable to the room we had. our room was old and outdated. we had a kai suite with an adjoining room. the 2 rooms connected through the bedroom of the suite, how silly is that?!?

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellency and personalized service from staff.
title: Great Business & Vacation Hotel
comment: Restaurants were great, pool was a welcoming site, peaceful place. High security and professional personnel . Meet people and make new friends. If you know what I mean lol.

title: Outstanding Front Desk!
comment: I would like to recognize Rachel who works at the front desk. I called on Thursday July 19th to confirm our weekend reservations and she was so polite and helpful. When we checked in the next afternoon (July 20th), a young lady asked if she could help me, so gave her my name and she said hello and she remembered my name from our phone conversation the previous day. It made my day:) Thanks for making our stay so pleasurable. We had 4 rooms for the weekend.

title: Refreshing
comment: Got a room in the Marina tower overlooking the harbor - Beautiful! Staff service was great - from room, to dining, to front desk, to the valet service. We especially enjoy the Big Bay Downtown Shuttle ($1 a day) service.

title: great accomodations
comment: We stayed here 5 nights on a Hershey Park trip from NY. The staff were extremely helpful, the facilities were excellent, great pool, great club lounge with tons of food. We would definitely stay here again when we come back to the area. the only downer to the hotel is the bvathroom is small, other than that if you are going for pleasure or business its a great hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: there are 2 separate room towers and parking lots. there are 2 separate entrances. it was as if 2 properties were purchased separately and merged as one
title: Did not receive what i booked
comment: my reservation was a room in their bay tower which was explicit per their reservation. i was attending a wedding reception in THAT tower yet my room was literally at the opposite end of the hotel property. the two towers are at opposite ends of their property- separated by a marina and 2 pools. It took over 20 mins to go from bay tower to the lanai bldg.

title: Belvoir HOTEL OVERLAND PARK
comment: AFTER 3 WEEKS OF TRAVEL WE DETERMINED THIS WAS THE BEST HOTEL WE STAYED. HOTEL IS GORGEOUS, FRIENDLY STAFF AND COMFORTABLE ROOM. GREAT LOCATION CLOSE TO EVERYTHING.

title: Location
comment: The location is perfect for walking and enjoying the downtown area; so easy to get around and the staff was incredibly helpful and friendly.

title: Great Staff
comment: The staff was helpful from the front desk to security. Cleaning staff was always willing to help.

title: Shower terrible
comment: The shower had a access door on the ceiling it had black mold all over it and was rusted looking. The drain for the shower was clogged.

title: Great Stay!!
comment: I had a great stay at this Belvoir in Old Towne. I've stayed at many hotels before this and none compare. The only complaint I really have is that the shuttle didn't go everywhere I expected it to go, so I had to make adjustments to my schedule,etc. But other than that the staff was courteous and helpful!! I will definitely be staying here again!!

everyoneShouldKnow: Worth the travel some distance from the interstate.
title: Comfortable!
comment: We arrived late evening to a quite comfortable room in an appealing setting. The suite was well laid out. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Just as good the second time
comment: Great staff, location and quiet. I'm coming back next month!

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a nice hotel but nothing out of the ordinary.
title: Hotel was good but could have been better
comment: I expected to have a hair dryer at an upscale hotel. We had a "harbor view" room but our view was a tree and the pool if you looked down. The bottled water in the room should be clearly labeled as to cost. I believe some would think it is complimentary but it is $2.50 a bottle. The hotel is nice and the service was good. We found it difficult to locate our first time in Norfolk. You can't use the luggage carts without the valet (tips).

title: Too much tax and hidden fees
comment: I was shocked to find almost an extra hundred dollars tacked onto my bill for taxes! Also extra was charged for supposedly complimentary bottles of water that were put in the room. It was explained that the large bottles were not complimentary but the small bottles were. Where was this posted? It was not!

title: Service
comment: The hotel was packed with a special event and summer and the staff was amazing and kind and still kept their professionalism and humor through some tough moments!

title: advocare weekend
comment: On july 22 we left the room at 7:15, came back between 4 and 5pm, our room wasn't cleaned at all. I left the tag on bed to change towels, when we arrived at that time, our card didn't work , so we called the front desk and they sent one quickly,a guest personal came up to give us another key, we had told him about our room not being cleaned and he said he would get it taken care of. We didn't get a chance to clean up and change clothes and left to finish the conference, we made it back between 9:30 and 10pm, when we returned room still not cleaned no towels,we went down to use the computer to print out our plane tickets, printer was out of paper, The man handed me a stack of paper , I guess I was suppose to figure out loading it, We then spoke to the man at the desk around 10pm sunday night, And he said he would bring up our towels, 2 hours later we called and a girl brought up some large towels, We had to inform her that we needed wash cloths to, so she came back up and tby then we found out we neded coffee and cups,So that took close to an hour, I didn;t mean for that poor girl to have to keep running back and fourth , she was very nice, But I guess if our room was cleaned sometime that day, it wouldn't have been a problem. I know your Hotel was busy , but I do believe you have conventions all the time, Thank you for listening

everyoneShouldKnow: Its clean! You pay for what you get!
title: wonderful!
comment: Checking in was easy and fast! Room was clean bed was comfortable! Will definitely stay there again

title: Great hotel
comment: Staff and location of hotel was perfect for my conference.

everyoneShouldKnow: There is free breakfast and afternoon snack in the lounge. Pool is indoor and outdoor. Rooms are clean and staff is friendly.
title: Staff strives to meet your needs
comment: Anything I asked for was given or done for us.

title: Great Location
comment: The hotel is in a good spot relative to the Christian Science Church where we had a conference. I think the elevators need to be upgraded. It took too long to wait for one, especially when one is suppose to meet someone in the lobby. The consierge could have been more knowledgeable about the area to offer help. The instructions given to take the subway was way off and fortunately we got it right after talking with others.

title: UNIQUE HOTEL EXPERIENCE
comment: This hotel is below average as the rooms go and to much furniture in the rooms not good layout to the flow of the furnishings. The rooms have very poor lighting also. The most upsetting thing is the bathroom door is always in the way since the room is to small. The suites are nice but overpriced for this location.

everyoneShouldKnow: Located across the street from the Isle of Shoals tour company.
title: Had a very pleasant stay
comment: Quick and easy check-in and check-out. Staff very friendly and helpful. The food service was very good too.

title: VERY UNCLEAN
comment: Last month my family and I checked into Sharaton Washington North after something like a 30 min wait time. We were not given the correct room type and were originally taken to the 3rd floor that smelled of sweaty gym bags, the second we left the elevator. Ater noticing that the rooms smelled the same and that the bathrooms didn't look to have been cleaned, we went back to the front desk (after about five minutes) and were finally given the room types we requested- the same rooms we were told, "are not currently available." Once we got into our connecting rooms and began to get comfy, it suddenly became VERY clear that there was a man in my bed who did not clean up after himself, nor was he cleaned up after. We were then given free this, waived fee that, free this, waived fee that, but it just doesn't seem like enough. My 12 y o twin cousins shared that room with me...Belvoir should definitely consider doing things right the first time, as although the cost was dramatically dropped, I will still never step foot in there. What other messes didn't we see...?

title: MR. MARINA
comment: Parking a HASSLE, MAKES IT DIFFICULT

title: Misleading Signage
comment: I stayed on the fourth floor with a sign just off the elevator indicating vending and ice was down the hall. There is no vending or ice on the fourth floor. I had to go to the third floor.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is in a great location right on the edge of the quarter. Walking distance to Convention Center and SuperDome.
title: Belvoir on Canal
comment: The hotel is still under going renovations so there is really no restaurant to speak of, and the pool is tiny. Plus the sheets were dirty in our room when we checked in. They came and changed them right away, but still it was a surprise to see stained sheets at a Belvoir. The staff was SUPER HELPFUL AND FRIENDLY.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is downtown and everything closes after lunch and does not open aty weekends
title: Hotel
comment: Attended conference so hotel fine but area lacked facilities for any other stay.

title: great bed
comment: I stayed in room 1854. Can you tell me the brand of the bed and the brand of the bedding? I must get the same for my home.

everyoneShouldKnow: Rooms are very quiet and is private.
title: Great location
comment: Travel to OKC often for medical reasons. Location is great. Close to recreation as well as medical facilities. Staff very friendly and helpful. Room very nice and confortable every time we stay.

title: Comfortable and restfull
comment: Coming up for a family function, we stayed at the Belvoir Suites. The room was clean and comfortable. It was very nice having a Micro and Frig in the room. We used the pool and hot tub which were clean and seemed to be well maintained.

title: Housekeeping
comment: Superb overall. However housekeeper for our room lacked..... Not the Grandbourne quality!!!!

everyoneShouldKnow: They try to nickle and dime you for everything.
title: Not Happy with this Belvoir
comment: Parking was $22 and it was for the public also so if we came back at night we were lucky if we could find a place to park. As a Gold member one of my "perks" is to be upgraded to the Club house level and use the Club house - this Belvoir wants you to pay an additional $20 a night to use the Club house. I will never go back to this Belvoir.

everyoneShouldKnow: Truely a home away from home
title: Annual Hershey Park trip
comment: Have been staying here the last 5 years for the family get together at Hershey Park.

title: Thank you!
comment: We enjoyed our stay at the Belvoir Santa Monica. The room was comfortable and the hotel is within a reasonable walking distance of the pier, restaurants and shoping. Bus service is easy if you don't want to drive. Staff was very friendly, helpful and quick.

everyoneShouldKnow: Hotel is right on the beach and it has a wonderful ocean view with an amazing beach service.
title: Edi
comment: This hotel is very well located, most part of the rooms have wonderful ocean view, rooms are very clean and well maintained. Beach service is fantastic, however unfortunately wifi and parking are not included in the room price.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location, CLEAN and friendly staff.
title: Great experience!
comment: My husband and I travel quite a bit and frankly don't get excited about 'regular' hotels very much. We were expecting a comfortable stay going with the Belvoir name, but this hotel was really GREAT! The rooms were really clean (we stayed on the 9th floor) and the staff SOOO FRIENDLY and HELPFUL! I would recommend this hotel and will be back if I am near Harrisburg! A++++

title: Great view
comment: In general I was very pleased with my stay, however I was very disappointed with the fact that I had to pay $25 in addition to my room fee to park my car. I found this ridiculous especially since I had paid for my room/reservation in advance.

title: relaxing and comforting
comment: We enjoyed our stay. The rooms were very nice, the beds were comfortable, the staff though I think were in training, were very nice and accommodating. Would definitely stay there again

everyoneShouldKnow: It is clean, quiet room, pleasant experience
title: Clean and comfortable
comment: A retro blast from the past type hotel. It was clean and provided all our needs during our stay

title: Great location and room
comment: overall was a great experience, hotel was a bit crowded when I first arrived but room was clean and bed was comfortable. I would stay at this hotel again.

title: Lacked value
comment: Employees were personable and efficient. The eating level is extremely loud, breakfast buffet standard with limited fresh seasonal fruit. About a four block walk to the ocean, disappointed it was not closer for the cost of this room. Comfortable bed, clean facility.

title: Amazing Front Desk Staff
comment: Just wanted to commend your front desk staff, who remembers me by name and always makes me feel very welcome. I travel on business a lot, and appreciate the warm welcome and helpfulness throughout my stay. In particular, I'd like to recommend Ranjit, Hanna and Alex. They are terrific!

everyoneShouldKnow: Perfect location if you are going to Epcot and want to experience the Boardwalk.
title: July visit
comment: My husband and I stayed at the Dolphin for 2 nights. We were upgraded to a king sized room with a balcony that overlooked the lake. It was beautiful. The room was comfortable. The bathroom required updating, but who stays at a hotel for the bathrooms? It was so convienent to be able to walk to the Boardwalk and Epcot. Staff were friendly and very helpful.

title: SMALL rooms and out of date
comment: Although the staff was great about relocating us, the first room we had smelled bad and then we were relocated to a much bigger room. However, the bathrooms are very small, and the light in the bathroom had an AWFUL buzzing noise sometimes when turned on. The club level amenities are great, but I would choose the Westin over this hotel every time for the comfort and extra space in the rooms. Without central air, the room was stuffy.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellant location, easy on & off to anywhere you are going.
title: Great service in the BPG Lounge
comment: the staff was very friendly both at night and in the morning. The food & refreshments offered were great!

everyoneShouldKnow: More consideration to the guest that stay and have issues like I mentioned. You do know there are other hotels to stay in NO?!?!?
title: Disorganized
comment: I was very disappointed that we were given a room full of kids on that floor. It was a nightmare to get any rest. The noise and screaming went on until 3:00 am and started back up at 4:30am with a "Happy Birthday" singing. I called security 4 x's and nothing changed. When I mentioned the situation the staff didn't seem to care. Of course you already had my VISA and charged the room. They could have adjusted one night to make me happy or even given us a meal at the hotel but nothing was offered like they didn't care that we had a miserable night. The elevators was another problem.

everyoneShouldKnow: It's located right on the river with many opportunities for recreation, shopping, dining or just relaxing and watching the boats go by.
title: Great View From Room
comment: Great view of the river. Plenty of dining and shopping choices nearby.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is not worth the money at all!
title: Nothing but Problems!
comment: Where to start.

everyoneShouldKnow: That everything is designed for relaxation.
title: Wonderfull!!!!
comment: The staff is great and the room went beyond our expectations. The hotel was kept neet and clean and the food was prepared just right. We will deffenitly return for another visit.

everyoneShouldKnow: You will need a car to enjoy Old San Juan
title: Fun in San Juan
comment: Overall, a fantastic hotel with solid amenities! I really like the location as it is away from all the hustle of San Juan. Customer service was Outstanding and recognition as a Gold Member was equally impressive. The pool area was one of the best seen to date, but the only criticism was the cleanliness of the pool itself. It was not crystal clean as expected and the Spa needed some attention...perhaps more chemicals, or something. But, as stated, the ambiance was second to none. Also, the Club Lounge was great. Thanks for an excellent stay. Also, why only single bathrooms in the reception area...kind of strange for such a large area???

title: delfina hotel
comment: Great hotel! Staff very helpful!

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is great. Convenient to all Anaheim attractions. Needs work however!
title: Not up to Belvoir standards!
comment: Huge room on ground floor. Quiet. Spotted carpet, with 2 beetles and a slug in residence! Room needed decor. One tiny picture, and a mirror behind the TV which didn't work properly. Previously left trash and beer can on dirty outside window/sill remained for our entire stay despite staff walking by. Tub faucet seemed "plugged" and water had a strong sulfur smell. Took a long time for hot water! Very disappointing for a Belvoir in a great location......

title: Great stay
comment: Great location, great room, great rooftop club lounge, friendly staff

title: Great
comment: Will be back for the second time in 7 days!

everyoneShouldKnow: Double check your reservation and make sure they have the correct room for the number of people staying
title: overall review
comment: The outdoor pool was very small. The cocktails were very expensive and watered down. Moxt of the bartenders were not very nice and acted like they were bothered when I ordered a drink. The cleanning crew wold come very early when we were still in bed and when we asked them to come back they came very late.

title: Not worth the price paid
comment: This hotel is not worth the price paid. Also, did not get the platinum benefits.

everyoneShouldKnow: their staff is professional and tuned into details
title: Family Reunion Outstanding
comment: The hotel and its staff were wonderful. We held our reunion activities there and the staff were more than helpful. The facilities were superb. I can say this honestly, not only was the hotel hosting our function but they were professional and quite organized while they were hosting two other family reunions, a national sporting event, a national battleship crew reunion and let's not mention that JazzFest was being held 1 block away. Rhoda, CJ(banquet captain) and Louis(banquet services) were FANTASTIC!!!!!!! Oh, and the FOOD for our banquet was great.

title: Belvoir
comment: Older hotel but nice and clean. Staff was very courtesy and helpful; especially beach boys with setting up chairs and umbrellas.

title: Great location
comment: Stayed here for a recent family trip and enjoyed the hotel. Friendly, helpful staff, great location, and nice rooms.

title: Great5 facility
comment: Great location and facility, staff, etc. Would stay here again in a heart beat

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is great. Shopping next door. CVS and a Whole Foods Market!
title: GREAT WEEKEND
comment: Great ammenties and location. Staff is incredible.

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel is going to be remedoled very soon! The look of furniture lights and old telephone will be changed!
title: Club lounge needs improvement
comment: I am a 23 years BPG member and also a Grandbourne Platinum! I do travel a lot and I do expect the same club lounge amenities at all the Belvoir in the USA ! This lounge had no espresso machine during my stay! The food choice was very limited! like no bananas or raspberries or pineapple like lounge in NYC or Chicago for breakfast! I really think the management needs to call corporate and get a list if items served in other lounges at Belvoir

title: Great location good hotel
comment: Location was close to everything I needed, airport, Mission Beach, Balboa Park and downtown. Hotel was elegant, quiet and comfortable. The staff was excellent and professional, best I have experienced in a long time. Lack of parking (and a dirt lot at that), no refrigerators in the room and a dirty hallway carpet were why gave it a 4 star rating rather than 5. Overall a great place and I would recommend staying there.

title: Atlantic City stay
comment: We arrived before check in and our room was not ready. We parked our car and went off to the boardwalk. We came back hours later and checked in. We had a nice complimentary upgrade since our room had not been ready. The room had a beautiful view of all the hotels and ocean. However I was disapointed in the cleanliness of the room. Over all the room was clean and it wasn't until the next day that I discovered something that quite upset me. The blanket that I sleep in had a stain on the end and had been tucked into the bed. I slept on a used and soiled blanket. I brought that to the attention of the staff and I was given a new blanket. The next night I slept peacefully. I realize that the upkeep of each room is timely but that should have been noticed. I also realize that the blankets aren"t changed for each guest. I knew the comforters weren"t but not the blankets. That left an uncomfortable feeling.

title: Great hotel, gym in middle of renovations
comment: Had a great one night stay here. Just be aware the gym is under going renovations (as of 07/2012) and the temporary gym is essentially a gutted hotel room. Very cramped.

title: Outstanding!!!
comment: When visiting family/friends this has always and will continue to be my favorite hotel because of location, staff, service and the food is great. Each visit has been outstanding!!

everyoneShouldKnow: difficult to find....but very nice, great view of lake.
title: great experience
comment: We had a wonderful visit at the Belvoir in Columbia MD. The only thing that was surprising was the cost of the Brunch. It was a little steep, but the food was wonderful!

everyoneShouldKnow: It is very close to Epcot - I could easily walk
title: Internet problems
comment: I enjoyed my stay at WDW Dolphin, yet seemed to have ongoing problems with the internet and wifi in particular. Internet response was slow and when I tried to facetime with my husband it rarely worked (I have had it easily work in other hotels)., If you are going to charge extra for a service like this, I believe strongly that it should work - so this was very disappointing. Other than that the staff was nice and the room very clean.

title: Great Experience at the Belvoir
comment: We had a great stay at the Belvoir New York. Our room had an amazing view of Central Park which is within walking distance. Hotel is also close to shopping and Times Square - great central location. Enjoyed the renovated , clean room.

title: Great hotel and location
comment: The hotel location in proximity to the interstate, airport and downtown are perfect. The staff is prompt and friendly, rooms are new and clean. Really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely stay here next time I'm in Roanoke.

title: Great Location!
comment: This hotel was very clean with a spacious bedroom. The location was perfect - walking distance to Central Park, Rockefeller Center and Times Square. I am so glad that we chose this location for a mother/daughter weekend get-away.

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel takes pride in providing excellent customer service!
title: Features
comment: Clean, comfortable, great service.

title: Excellent location, poor service
comment: Our room had a first-rate view of the city, river and lake but was in poor condition. The bathroom sink was cracked and the tub did not drain properly; when used for a shower water collected ankle-deep. We requested a mirror to use for make up. but this request along with the other concerns went unanswered Though we informed the front desk of these issues the first morning of our stay, they were not addressed at all during the four remaining nights we spent in Chicago. The conference facilities were very good, making the meeting we attended comfortable.

title: Favorite Hotel
comment: This is literally my favorite hotel. We've stayed at countless resorts in Disney, and this place bests them all. GREAT prices, GREAT service. A+!

everyoneShouldKnow: A dining and breakfast experience at the Kai Market is a must!
title: Awesome vacation stay...
comment: From the minute we arrived to our departure, we were treated with utmost hospitality. My wife requires a wheelchair and had absolutely no problems with the room, restaurants and amenities.

everyoneShouldKnow: Good location to Universal Studios and Hollywood.
title: Very Pleased
comment: We were very pleased with our stay at your hotel. We needed some attention to a plumbing issue and it was taken care of immediately. Further, Jayson at the front desk, was very helpful with transportation to the airport on relatively short notice.

title: the rooms were great with the most comfortable beds of any motel I have stayed with in the last 5 years.
comment: The motel is located just minutes from many attractions in the Northern Columbus area with many great resturants within walking distance. We have stayed at this location once before when we visited the Columbus Zoo, a great place to visit. Our family will be planning another trip and will stay at the same location.

everyoneShouldKnow: Very clean, very convenient location, great staff.
title: Friendly Staff
comment: I was very happy to see Jonathan at the check-in desk at my latest visit. He has been with this facility for about 4 years and has always been very friendly. I stay at this location about once a year and highly recommend it. The staff is very good, the beds are outstanding and the location is extremely convenient.

title: Wonderful Anaheim Experience
comment: My daughters and I just came back from a 5 night stay at your hotel. We were all very impressed with the hotel and especially with the staff. Everyone was very professionl, helpful and friendly. It made our "Disney" vaction extra special to have some great accomodations.

title: Great Stay!
comment: We did a family vacation to St. Louis and stayed here. We had a great stay! The hotel was clean and comfortable, our kids enjoyed the pool and the staff were always very friendly and ready to help in any way. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to the area.

title: Great place to stay for a Rangers Game
comment: WE arrived during the parking of a Rangers game. As we drove in the staff at the drive entrance were courteous and professional. Next as we drove up to the entrance the bell staff/valets were extremely professional. They took care of my vehicles and it was nice not to worry about parking myself. The front desk young lady was great and check was a breeze. Most hotels have slow elevator service but not here. We got to the room and all we could say was WOW. We weren't looking at the ballpark but it was just as good. Only negative was an issue with the bed ruffle. We had a blast and will definitely come back. Thanks and keep up the great job.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location to Down Town Disney
title: Excellent Stay
comment: The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean. The pools are very inviting and refreshing. We would definately stay again. The elevator doors are to close to the stairwell exits so it was hard to accomodate others.

title: Great Hotel
comment: This is my third stay at Belvoir Anaheim hotel and I can't wait to visit again soon.. From the moment that I arrive to the moment I leave I always feel welcome by the staff, everyone is always polite and friendly and no request is too small or insignificant.. I would like to give a special mention to Cynthia who works in the bar for her outstanding professionalism and customer service...

title: Great Hotel!
comment: This hotel had mixed reviews, but it was nothing but top notch for us during our entire stay. The hotel is beautiful and clean and within walking distance to all the attractions. The valet staff was very professional and kept my car safe, so although the extra $ for parking was a bit pricey, overall it was well worth it.

title: This is a tired hotel.
comment: The cooling system is poor. During my stay my room was never comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: Food is really expensive - no good, cheap options
title: Average
comment: Average hotel with expensive food

title: Great Hotel-Great Price!
comment: We were timid because some of the reviews said differently. This hotel was great! We would stay here again!

title: Great stay
comment: Staff are so friendly and looking for ways to assist. Didn't have to go looking for someone. Have enjoyed each of my stays at this hotel.

title: Great place to stay
comment: This was our second stay at the Harborside. All of the staff was friendly and accommodating during stay. The hotel is located within walking distance of the harbor, restaurants and shops. The lounge is a perfect place to unwind after a day or evening in town.

title: Excellent hotel
comment: This was the first vacation our family had taken in 3 years. This hotel went above and beyond our expectations. The room was clean and comfortable, the hotel restaurants were excellent and the beach and pool were wonderful. We can't wait to stay here again!

title: Needs improvement
comment: Overnight stay when traveling south. One night was enough. Not the cleanest Belvoir. First room smelled like an ashtray although establishment is smoke free. Second room found empty liquor bottle under bed. Staff average but do not recognize BPG guests. Would not stay here again although restaurant was good with pleasant service. The location is the best part.

title: This hotel has a great location
comment: This hotel is perfectly situated for walking downtown Palo Alto and visiting Stanford University.

title: Absolutely Beautiful
comment: This hotel was so beautiful and I felt very relaxed. The staff was wonderful and helpful. This is a hotel that I will visit again.

title: Excellent as always
comment: I stay at this hotel 2-4 times per month and they consistently deliver excellent service. Great location and friendly staff make this my favorite hotel in the LA area.

title: Average, which is not a bad thing
comment: Older property with balcony, but hvac unit blows onto the balcony. Good enough. No issues.

everyoneShouldKnow: The service we received was excellent.
title: Good location and service
comment: As a platinum member we had a wonderful upgrade. We enjoyed the room and requested a refrigerator because we were traveling with perishable food in 100 degree temperatures in a cooler. They supplied the refrigerator. The bathroom had a shower usually seen in European hotels that save on water. The club room had very nice appetizers and breakfast. We were very pleased with this our third stay at this hotel.

title: Overall excellent
comment: We found the Dolphin to be an outstanding hotel experience with only two areas that we were not pleased with.

everyoneShouldKnow: accept pets, which is a good thing for pet lovers
title: HOTEL FEATURES
comment: especially enjoyed the pool and the hot tub- very relaxing and the exercise room a very good choice for health conscious people

title: Great Stay
comment: This is a lovely downtown Seattle hotel convenient to many attractions, shopping and restaurants. The rooms are very nice and beds are great. Nice fitness center. Staff was very helpful but concierge explanation of bus schedule was confusing. Would definitely return to this hotel.

title: Great airport hotel
comment: Excelent hotel and great value. Very comfortable bed and great pillows. I had a great view to the golf course across a small river. Kudos to the valet guys. All very courteous and they even offer you a bottle of cold water for take in the car to cool off. Overall great staff. My only critique was going to the bar when the restaurant was closed and they didn't have an expresso machine or even a regular coffee machine to resolve it quickly. The barman was very nice but he had to go to another floor to ask someone else to make it and after about 20 minutes came with coffee. I don't know if it's a concession or hotel managed, but in this day and age a bar like that should have an expresso machine or at minimum regular coffee avialbel at all times during the day. Ironically, while I was checking out another person came up to the front desk asking where they could get a cup of coffee. By the way, there is an individual coffee machine and free coffee in the rooms, but, just like me , some people want to meet with others at the bar not in the room. Other than that, overall great experience and great hotel if you want to stay near the airport.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is very clean and the staff goes beyond helpful.
title: Excellant experience
comment: We were very impressed by all the staff, everyone was helpful going beyond the (call of duty) to help and very pleasant while doing so. You are commended on your training or just picking wonderful people to work for your facility.

title: Gunter
comment: Excellent stay -highly recommend

title: Location
comment: The location was ideal for the conference. It was not too crowded and it gave me a chance to see downtown Denver.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location for going to sporting events.
title: Great stay!
comment: Everything ran very smooth. Easy check in, friendly staff, clean room.

everyoneShouldKnow: The front desk staff is amazing.
title: Clean and comfortable
comment: This hotel has a wonderful staff. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. There is a wonderful breakfast buffet with made to order omelettes and a bar if you'd like to stay in for the evening. I loved walking around the pond at night, the paved path is definitely nice. Truly was a great stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: Room was great. Restaurant at hotel is good. It is only a few blocks away from gas station and airport rental car drop off. However, restaurants outside are not within the walking distance. Hotel needs facelift to look as if it is a new hotel.
title: Location to Airport Rental Car Drop Off
comment: This hotel is very close to gas station and the airport rental car drop off (only a few blocks away) without any hassle. BIG PLUS! However, other than a good restaurant inside the hotel, restaurants et al are not within the short walking distance. This clean hotel looks old and needs new facelift! Room is very good. However, for my wife's severe vision impairment and NIGHT blindness, there were several dark spots in room so maid provided several extra lamps which were VERY HELPFUL.

title: Needs a major upgrade
comment: I had to switch rooms twice!!! First room had a horrible odor and a leaking ceiling. Second room the air conditioning was not working and the nightstand were filthy from the last persons stay. Rooms need a major upgrade. Not enough staff at the front desk as there was a large group checking in and only 3 people at the front desk.

title: Excellent location
comment: Nice rooms, view,clean, extra friendly staff, will definitely stay again.

everyoneShouldKnow: it is where you would want to be on 7th avenue
title: This hotel was beyond expectations
comment: location was excellant, central for all sights.

title: Allows dogs in rooms
comment: I called the front desk around 11 PM after the third barking incident next door, followed by the owners loud command to stop barking. The hotel evidently sent security as I heard a loud knocking on the door of the room next door. Of course I was good for a couple of hours reading time as I'd had a nice nap. Was awaken again at 6 AM with barking... I won't stay at Belvoirs if they allow dogs in rooms...

everyoneShouldKnow: Outstanding service all the way around.
title: Great Stay
comment: Outstanding service, great to find out at check in we were upgraded to a suite. Thank you very much for the hospitality.

title: Adequate for a weekend stay
comment: Booked 2 rooms for a Saturday night recently and hotel met my expectations - as in, I wasn't expecting much. The room provided a place to sleep and shower, so what more do you need in AC? Location is great as it's close to shopping and food, and about a 10 minute walk from the boardwalk but without the grimey-ness of most AC casino hotels. Things I didn't appreciate were:

title: Needs some updating.
comment: With the exception of the bell hop & spa staff, service was non existent. On our 5 night stay, the first day the room wasn't cleaned, creamer in room was soured, club amenities were below standard/expectations, location was not great, last night club key didn't work and new ones weren't available (b/c their key machine wasn't working???). Only used the Club Lounge to get bottled water....went off site for breakfasts after the first day due to quality/lack of food.

title: Fantastic Customer Service
comment: The staff--and I mean every single person--was fantastic with their customer service! Nice rooms, great food, great ammenities, too.

title: BPG points
comment: we were with 6 persons and i made the reservation through the Lax booking service, which i thought the hotel supported.

everyoneShouldKnow: Lobby is clean rooms are DIRTY!
title: Just OK
comment: Room was very dirty..

title: Kaiulani 'A Real Princess"
comment: Very helpful staff and exceptional surroundings in a great location.

title: Convention
comment: Excellent conference facilities.

title: Room with a view, not
comment: Paid for "lake view" room and although it was not a complete lie, it should have said "great vew of the buildings accross the street, and a little bit of the lake". I put truth in advertising high on my list, to bad this hotel did not. Pictures of the lake view on the website are deceiving, most likely taken from above the 4th floor so if you stay and want a lakeview make sure you ask to be put above the 4th floor.

title: poor bellboy service
comment: the bellboys would not let us use the luggage carts. had to carry all our luggage to the room by hand. they said it was a new hotel policy due to the economy. sorry sheriton hotels, but you lost a longtime customer with this policy.

title: phantom charge
comment: We were charged for items prior to checking out without the staff having access to our room. After solving the misunderstanding, we later learned that the charge remained out our credit card.

everyoneShouldKnow: Its the best I've stayed in.
title: Hotel has an upper class feel for a great price.
comment: I went with 6 people. We were all impressed. Huge weight room. Starbucks coffee in the room. Breakfast was amazing.

everyoneShouldKnow: Bring your money, surprised they didn't charge for TP
title: Overpriced and underperformed
comment: Internet service was $12 per day and was intermittent at best. Brought back memories of DSL. Cable TV lost signal 3-4 times per day, but only at prime viewing times. Wasted ten minutes waiting for bill to come up on online checkout, only to be told service was't available at this time.

everyoneShouldKnow: Proximity to Broadway plays and Time Square
title: Great service accommodating 2,000 women at one time
comment: A couple thousand women descended on the Belvoir for one week. The service, the food, the attention to detail, all met or exceeded our expectations. One young woman at Reception was particularly awesome in resolving a complicated registration issue. Beth was patient, concerned, and efficient! Bless her!

title: Nice place to stay
comment: The facility was nice, the staff was courteous, the rooms were great and the pools were nice too

title: Thoroughly Enjoyable
comment: I would go to Disney again for the Dolphin and never even go to the parks! The Dolphin was great in every way. We were upgraded for a small cost to a room with a view of water and the fireworks. The staff members were extremely polite, turning off vacuums, trimmers, standing aside, etc when we would walk by. The lobby was opulent, yet comfortable with great people watching areas. The Dolphin was majestic and over the top, without being gaudy.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great food and service at Phillips.
title: Return Visit
comment: Another visit to this hotel shows this facility continues to offer the best in comfort, convenience and service. Absolutely a must location every time my work schedule brings me to Philadelphia

everyoneShouldKnow: There is a skybridge to the mall with a food court.
title: Very friendly staff
comment: This hotel has very friendly staff. The room was nice, although a little warm. I would stay here again.

title: Great service
comment: I didn't have a hair dryer in my room, called housekeeping, - they were there in 5 minutes. Front desk staff very courteous. The hotel bar is a friendly place for solo dining. My room was much nicer than previous stays. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Would not stay there again.
comment: While the rooms were clean and comfortable, my group and I experienced a number of issues, which the hotel was slow to resolve.

title: Great Beds
comment: Everything was super, everything you need at hand. Hotel staff and convention staff outstanding. My only complaint is that there is a $10 service charge for the fitness center. I didn't even use it, (sad to say), but there should not be a charge for that to a hotel guest, and I am from Vegas, where the hotels WANT YOU THERE, and there is NEVER a parking fee! I think parking should come with the cost of your room.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is clean, comfortable and safe.
title: Meeting requests
comment: I need a copy of a room service receipt and asked TWICE, provided my information TWICE. Please email me a copy of my rom service receipt for July 22, 2012, room #910.

title: Great Value
comment: We were suprised how nice the propety was. We enjoyed a live Tuesday night jazz concert at the pool while we had dinner and drinks.

title: The hotel was very nice.
comment: We would definitely come back to this hotel. The private beach was very nice but would like lounge chairs provided that do not cost. There was plenty to do in the area. Hotel staff were friendly and answered any questions we had.

title: Needs Improvement
comment: Despite having booked my room 2 months in advance, my room was not available when I arrived. I waited over 2.5 hours for my room to become available (along with at least 5 other people who were in the same situation) causing me to miss my conce sessions (reason for being there).
